sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT teacher.teacher_no, teacher.real_name, teacher.gender, teacher.title, teacher.phone, teacher.email, college.college_name FROM teacher JOIN college ON teacher.college_id = college.id WHERE teacher.real_name = '孔航' AND teacher.is_deleted = 0 AND college.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.teacher_no, base.real_name, base.gender, base.title, base.phone, base.email, base.college_name FROM base
